contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced stub|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} {{Infobox Former Country |native_name = Sénégambie et Niger |conventional_long_name = Senegambia and Niger |common_name = Senegambia and Niger | |continent = Africa |region = Western Africa |country = |era = |status = Colony |empire = France |government_type = |year_start = 1902 |year_end = 1904 |life_span = | |event_start = Established |date_start = |event_end = [[Disestablished]] |date_end = |event_pre = |date_pre = |event1 = |date_event1 = |event2 = |date_event2 = |event3 = |date_event3 = | |p1 = French Sudan |flag_p1 = Flag of France.svg |s1 = Upper Senegal and Niger |flag_s1 = Flag of France.svg |s2 = |flag_s2 = |s3 = |flag_s3 = | |image_flag = Flag of France.svg |flag = |image_coat = |symbol = |image_map = | |capital = |national_anthem = |common_languages = [[French language|French]] |religion = |currency = [[French West African franc]] | |leader1 = |year_leader1 = |leader2 = |year_leader2 = |leader3 = |year_leader3 = |leader4 = |year_leader4 = |leader5 = |year_leader5 = |leader6 = |year_leader6 = |title_leader = |representative1 = |year_representative1 = |representative2 = |year_representative2 = |representative3 = |year_representative3 = |title_representative = |deputy1 = |year_deputy1 = |deputy2 = |year_deputy2 = |deputy3 = |year_deputy3 = |deputy4 = |year_deputy4 = |deputy5 = |year_deputy5 = |deputy6 = |year_deputy6 = |title_deputy = |footnotes = }} '''Senegambia and Niger''' was a short-lived administrative unit of the [[France|French]] possessions in [[Africa]], formed in 1902 and reorganized in 1904 into [[Upper Senegal and Niger]]. Despite its brief existence, the French government still managed to issue [[postage stamp]]s for the administrative unit, in the form of a version of its [[Navigation and Commerce|Navigation and Commerce series]], inscribed "SENEGAMBIE / ET NIGER". ==See also== * [[Senegal]] * [[The Gambia]] * [[Sénégambia Confederation|Senegambia]] * [[Niger]] * [[Postage stamps and postal history of Senegambia and Niger]] * [[List of French possessions and colonies]] {{Former French colonies}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Senegambia And Niger}} [[Category:1904 disestablishments]] [[Category:Former French colonies]] [[Category:French West Africa]] [[Category:History of Senegal]] [[Category:History of Niger]] [[Category:States and territories established in 1902]] [[Category:France–Senegal relations]] [[Category:France–Niger relations]] {{Niger-stub}} {{Africa-hist-stub}}
